where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'component feature to layout feature' ) AND NOT ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'COMPONENT_INTERFACE_TERMINAL' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'COMPONENT_TERMINAL' ] * TYPEOF ( sar . relating_shape_aspect ) ) > 0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'component feature to layout feature' ) AND NOT ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'STRATUM_FEATURE' ] * TYPEOF ( sar . related_shape_aspect ) ) > 0 ) ) ) = 0
